oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Field cup and container
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Asst. Surgeon Dr. Elihu Pierce, 6th N. H. Inf., USA, carried this field cup and leather container during the Civil War. Pierce also served on the 9th Army Corps Train in Alexandria, Virginia, at the end of the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
